programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Edwin van der Sar has faced down pressure on the biggest stages in world football, but his toughest battle came after retirement. In 2023, the legendary goalkeeper suffered a life-threatening brain haemorrhage. In this episode Edwin opens up on his recovery and looks back on his career at the top that redefined goalkeeping. From Champions League glory with Ajax and Manchester United to his command

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Ben Johnson returns to Detroit as his Bears line up against the Lions. Johnson spent six years in the Detroit organization, but his Chicago tenure began with a shocking 27-24 loss to Minnesota. The Lions fell flat in a 27-13 road loss to the Packers.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Colts seek their first 2-0 start since 2009 as they host the Broncos. Daniel Jones passed for 272 yards and accounted for three touchdowns, two on the ground, in his Indianapolis debut, a 33-8 victory over Miami. Denver survived Tennessee 20-12.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: Host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recap the day's NFL highlights. Jac Collinsworth and Rodney Harrison contribute on-site.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: J.J. McCarthy leads the Vikings (1-0) into a prime-time clash against the Falcons (1-0). McCarthy threw for two TDs, a two-point conversion, and rushed for another score all in the fourth quarter as Minnesota stunned Chicago, 27-24, on Sept. 8.

programme.desc: A young woman is uprooted from her country in terrifying circumstances. After a headline-hitting evacuation to the UK, she finds a new home and community in a Yorkshire football club.

programme.desc: Coverage of the Hope Supercross in Bradford, the highest ranking cyclocross event of the 2025/26 UK season.

programme.title: UCI WorldTour Cycling
programme.desc: Men's Cycling World Tour action from the 2025 Grand Prix Montreal. This 209km race takes the riders on 17 demanding laps around Mount Royal.

programme.title: Vuelta a España
programme.desc: The 2025 La Vuelta reaches its climax with a 101km route from the village of Alalpardo to the Spanish capital of Madrid.

programme.title: Live: Ultimate Pool Pairs Cup
programme.desc: Ultimate Pool action from Group 15 of the Pairs Cup.

programme.title: CPL T20
programme.desc: Highlights from the Caribbean Premier League as Guyana Amazon Warriors met Barbados Royals.

programme.title: WA World Athletics Championships
programme.desc: Highlights from day three of the 2025 Athletics World Championship in Tokyo, featuring the finals of the Women's 100m Hurdles and Men's 3,000m Steeplechase.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC Fight at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, featuring the featherweight clash between Diego Lopes and Jean Silva.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Igor Tudor's Juventus aim to make it three wins from three as rivals Inter visit the Allianz Stadium desperate to recover from their setback against Udinese.

programme.title: The Breakdown
programme.desc: Darren Fletcher is joined by Ally McCoist, Joe Cole, Michail Antonio and Julien Laurens to assess the chances of all the main contenders ahead of the UCL league phase.

programme.title: FIA World Rally Championship
programme.desc: Highlights from day two of Rally Chile, part of the 2025 World Rally Championship.

programme.title: Australia Championship Supercars

programme.desc: Highlights from the Supercars Championship and day two of the 2025 Century Batteries Ipswich Super 440 at Queensland Raceway.

programme.title: Live: Australia Championship Supercars
programme.desc: Action from race 26 of the Repco Australia Supercars Championship at The Bend Motorsport Park in Tailem Bend.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: After an early setback in their Premier League title challenge, Arsenal look to bounce back as they host Ange Postecoglou's Nottingham Forest at the Emirates.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Igor Tudor's Juventus aim to make it three wins from three as rivals Inter visit the Allianz Stadium desperate to recover from their setback against Udinese.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: A look back at the dramatic 2000/01 UEFA Champions League final between Bayern Munich and Valencia at the San Siro in Milan. Bayern were chasing their first title in 25 years.

programme.title: FIA European Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from Rally UK in Aberystwyth, the latest round of the 2025 European Rally Championship.

programme.desc: Highlights from day two of Rally Chile, part of the 2025 World Rally Championship.

programme.desc: Action from the special stage 13 of Rally Chile and the 2025 World Rally Championship.

programme.desc: Highlights from the Caribbean Premier League showdown between Guyana Amazon Warriors and St. Lucia Kings.

programme.title: Asia Cup

programme.title: Live: Asia Cup
programme.desc: India face fierce rivals Pakistan in the group stage of the 2025 Asia Cup at Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

programme.desc: Highlights from the Caribbean Premier League showdown between Guyana Amazon Warriors and St. Lucia Kings.

programme.title: TNT Sports Reload
programme.desc: The best bits from TNT Sports over the last week, including exclusive interviews, the best action and so much more.

programme.title: UIM F1H2O World Championship Powerboat Racing
programme.desc: A review of the dramatic 2025 Grand Prix of Indonesia on Sumatra's Lake Toba, part of the UIM F1H20 World Championship in Indonesia.

programme.title: Live: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Major League Baseball action as San Francisco Giants face Los Angeles Dodgers.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Action from UFC Fight at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, featuring the featherweight clash between Diego Lopes and Jean Silva.

programme.title: MotoGP Chequered Flag
programme.desc: Post-race show featuring analysis, highlights and interviews with all the key riders following the 2025 Grand Prix of San Marino at Misano World Circuit Marco Simoncelli.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Massimiliano Allegri's AC Milan seek their first Serie A home win of the season as they welcome Vincenzo Italiano's Bologna to San Siro.

programme.title: UCI World Championship Mountain Biking
programme.desc: UCI Mountain Bike World Championship action from the Women's XCO Elite in Valais, Switzerland.

programme.title: UCI World Championship Mountain Biking
programme.desc: UCI Mountain Bike World Championship action from the Men's XCO Elite in Valais, Switzerland.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from Gallagher Premiership Rugby as Newcastle Falcons meet an in-form Bath Rugby at Kingston Park. Bath won 28-17 when these sides met in May.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Gallagher Premiership Rugby action as Saracens host Northampton Saints at StoneX Stadium. Both sides are looking to get back on track after losing their previous two league games.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Gallagher Premiership Rugby action as Bristol Bears host Sale Sharks at Ashton Gate. The Bears have won their last three league matches and put 54 points past the Tigers last week.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Gallagher Premiership Rugby action as high-flying Bath Rugby meet Saracens at the Recreation Ground. Sarries secured a dramatic 37-35 victory when these sides met in October.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from Gallagher Premiership Rugby as champions Northampton Saints face Newcastle Falcons at cinch Stadium. The Saints have lost their last three league matches.

programme.title: PREM Rugby
programme.desc: Action from Gallagher Premiership Rugby as Harlequins face Leicester Tigers at Allianz Stadium, Twickenham. The Quins are searching for their first league win since October.

programme.title: TNT Sports Cricket Reload
programme.desc: A look back at the first T20 between Australia and South Africa at TIO Stadium in Darwin, featuring a starring performances by Tim David and Josh Hazlewood.

programme.title: Asia Cup
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2025 Asia Cup as India faced fierce rivals Pakistan at Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

programme.title: Live: Asia Cup
programme.desc: Action from Zayed Cricket Stadium as United Arab Emirates face Oman in the group stage of the 2025 Asia Cup.

programme.title: Women's One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Action from the first Women's One Day International between India and Australia at Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium.

programme.title: NWSL
programme.desc: Action from the National Women's Soccer League as North Carolina Courage face Angel City FC.

programme.title: NWSL
programme.desc: Action from the National Women's Soccer League as Seb Hines' Orlando Pride face Bay FC at Inter&Co Stadium. Who will win this crucial clash between two out-of-form sides?

programme.title: WRC Review
programme.desc: A look back at the latest action from Rally Chile and the 2025 World Rally Championship.

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: Hosted by Rob Hatch, The Gruppetto brings you everything you need to stay up to speed with the world of cycling, from in-depth race reviews to the latest news from the peloton.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Anglers from all over the UK and Ireland gather at Lake of Menteith to compete for the largest cash prize in competition fly fishing in the Greys Lochstyle Team Championship.

programme.title: Global Champions Tour

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: Ben Johnson returns to Detroit as his Bears line up against the Lions. Johnson spent six years in the Detroit organization, but his Chicago tenure began with a shocking 27-24 loss to Minnesota. The Lions fell flat in a 27-13 road loss to the Packers.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Colts seek their first 2-0 start since 2009 as they host the Broncos. Daniel Jones passed for 272 yards and accounted for three touchdowns, two on the ground, in his Indianapolis debut, a 33-8 victory over Miami. Denver survived Tennessee 20-12.

programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: Host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recap the day's NFL highlights. Jac Collinsworth and Rodney Harrison contribute on-site.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: J.J. McCarthy leads the Vikings (1-0) into a prime-time clash against the Falcons (1-0). McCarthy threw for two TDs, a two-point conversion, and rushed for another score all in the fourth quarter as Minnesota stunned Chicago, 27-24, on Sept. 8.

programme.desc: Tampa Bay stays on the road to play Houston. The Buccaneers held on for a 23-20 win over the rival Falcons in Week 1. Bucs wide receiver Emeka Egbuka caught four passes for 67 yards and two TDs in his NFL debut. The Texans fell 14-9 to the Rams.

programme.desc: The Elks charge onto BMO Field for this game against the Argonauts. Edmonton won the Labour Day Classic rematch with Calgary for a third straight year on Sept. 6. Justin Rankin (EDM) rushed for 204 yards and two touchdowns in the 31-19 victory.

programme.title: Live: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 3 Dream host the No. 6 Fever in Game 1 of their WNBA first-round series. The teams split four games during the regular season, but Atlanta steamrolled Indiana 77-58 in the lone game the Fever played without injured star Caitlin Clark.

programme.title: Live: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 5 Liberty begin the quest for back-to-back titles by facing the No. 4 Mercury in a WNBA first-round series. Phoenix is 3-1 versus New York in 2025, with triple-double machine Alyssa Thomas averaging 17.3 points, 10.5 rebounds and 9.8 assists.

programme.title: Live: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: Heated rivals battle under the Sunday night lights as the Red Sox host the Yankees. Boston ace Garrett Crochet (15-5, 2.57 ERA), a contender for the American League Cy Young award, is 2-0 with a 2.95 ERA in three starts against New York this year.
